title: Requesting Sheikh to upload his Quran Recitation | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: uh faizan from india says uh he had he had a request and a question so his request is can i upload something of the recitation of the quran the answer is no i am not a reciter i am not a professional person i read quran like everyone else and this is a fitna when you do this for no other reason except that people like to listen to your voice so but no i don't think that would be possible
